content.text: The Tower‚Äôs doors swing open‚Ä¶ and you step into the Hall of Glyphs. A turtle-shaped spirit üê¢ greets you: ‚ÄúUse the magic of lines and shapes to draw your Hero Crest.‚Äù
In Python, drawing magic comes from the turtle module. Your turtle is a magical pet that draws wherever it moves.

items: Summon the turtle module to draw on the screen.
Use movement commands to create lines and shapes.
Add color and combine shapes into a crest.
Import turtle: import turtle
Create a turtle: t = turtle.Turtle()
Move: t.forward(x), t.backward(x)
Turn: t.right(angle), t.left(angle)
Finish: turtle.done()

content.title: Hero Training Drill 1 ‚Äì Make Your Turtle Walk üê¢

items: Walk forward 100 steps.
Turn right 90 degrees.
Walk forward 100 steps again.

content.text:
import turtle

t = turtle.Turtle()

t.forward(100)
t.right(90)

turtle.done()
Loops help draw shapes quickly. A square has 4 equal sides with 90¬∞ turns. A triangle has 3 sides with 120¬∞ turns. A circle can be drawn with t.circle(radius).

Set fillcolor = red.
Draw a square and fill it.

content.text:
import turtle

t = turtle.Turtle()

t.pencolor("black")
t.fillcolor("red")

for i in range(4):
    t.forward(100)
    t.right(90)
t.end_fill()

turtle.done()

content.title: Hero Training Drill 4 ‚Äì Add a Crest Symbol ‚≠ê

content.text: Add a circle in the middle of your shield.

import turtle

t = turtle.Turtle()

t.pencolor("black")
t.fillcolor("yellow")

# Shield

t.begin_fill()
for i in range(4):
    t.forward(120)
    t.right(90)
t.end_fill()

# Move turtle to center

t.penup()
t.goto(60, -60)
t.pendown()

# Crest circle

t.fillcolor("blue")
t.begin_fill()
t.circle(40)
t.end_fill()

turtle.done()
Forge your Hero Crest ‚Äî a badge that will travel with you forever.

instructions: Draw a shield base (square or circle).
Fill it with your hero‚Äôs color.
Add at least one symbol (circle, triangle, star).
Write your hero‚Äôs initial on it.

content.text:
import turtle

t = turtle.Turtle()

# Shield

t.pencolor("black")
t.fillcolor("red")
t.begin_fill()
for i in range(4):
    t.forward(150)
    t.right(90)
t.end_fill()

# Crest circle

t.penup()
t.goto(75, -75)
t.pendown()
t.fillcolor("yellow")
t.begin_fill()
t.circle(50)
t.end_fill()

# Initial

t.penup()
t.goto(30, -20)
t.pendown()
t.write("H", font=("Arial", 24, "bold"))

turtle.done()

content.text: Section: Crests
‚≠ê Crest Builder ‚Äî combine shapes and add an initial.

items: You can move the turtle with penup(), goto(x,y), pendown().
Write text with t.write("A", font=(...)).
Combine a base shape + a symbol shape.

content.text:
import turtle

t=turtle.Turtle()
# base square
for _ in range(4):
    t.forward(100)
    t.right(90)

# move to center

t.penup(); t.goto(50, -50); t.pendown()
t.circle(30)

t.penup(); t.goto(10, -10); t.pendown()
t.write("H", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"))

turtle.done()
